Computer science major at Penn State with an interest in robotics, data science, and full-stack software development.


Hello! I’m Ritij Jain, a second-year computer science student at The Pennsylvania State University.

I’m proficient in programming with Python. I also work with tools like Django, Jekyll, and Arduino. Currently open to internship/research/project opportunities. Have a look at my resume or reach me at ritij@ritijjain.com.

Find me on LinkedIn, GitHub, Instagram, and Twitter.
